ETYMOLOGY: Contraction of the phrase "God be with ye" (or "God b' wi' ye"), modeled on 'good day' or 'good night'.

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: An exclamation, often used to express emotion or to signal a transition, but grammatically independent of the main sentence structure.
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: An expression used when parting, often wishing the person well; farewell.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 再见；告别时用于道别的词语，表示祝福。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: It was great seeing you, but I really must go now. Goodbye!
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 很高兴见到你，但我现在真的得走了。再见！

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: A word that names something (a person, place, thing, or idea). C/U means Countable/Uncountable.
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: An act of saying farewell; a farewell itself.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 告别；道别（的行为或话语）。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: She didn't even stop to say goodbye before rushing to catch the train.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 她甚至没有停下来道个别就匆忙赶火车去了。
